article.title: AD_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: WiktionaryADad-adAnad(advertisement) is a form of marketing communication.
AD(Anno Domini) is a designation used to label years following 1 BC in the Julian and Gregorian calendars.

list.listitem: Anno Diocletiani, an alternative year numbering system
